channel.title: Comments on: Selection Policy – a Plea
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: By: Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: <a href="http://img.skysports.com/07/10/218x298/Paul_Horton_590413.jpg" rel="nofollow">Paul Horton</a> does seem ripe for some 'shoppery, you're right. His hair looks like it could very easily become mobile.
item.content:encoded: Paul Horton does seem ripe for some ‘shoppery, you’re right. His hair looks like it could very easily become mobile.

item.title: By: Ceci
item.dc:creator: Ceci
item.description: "Rampant on a field..." of course! Genius. I strongly suspect Moores now uses this picture as inspiration for his Lancashire mob - if they win some silverware this year he will be importuning you to top Key's majestic Pie-filled body with the nodding head of the King's other hero - Paul Horton.
item.content:encoded: “Rampant on a field…” of course! Genius. I strongly suspect Moores now uses this picture as inspiration for his Lancashire mob – if they win some silverware this year he will be importuning you to top Key’s majestic Pie-filled body with the nodding head of the King’s other hero – Paul Horton.
